snippet: Three weeks after making headlines with a game of strip billiards in a Las Vegas hotel suite, Prince Harry, third in line to the British throne, has begun a four-month deployment to Afghanistan.
abstract: Prince Harry, third in line to the British throne, begins a four-month deployment to Afghanistan, where he will fly combat missions against the Taliban.
lead_paragraph: Three weeks after making headlines with a game of strip billiards in a Las Vegas hotel suite, Prince Harry, third in line to the British throne, has begun a four-month deployment to Afghanistan.

headline.main: Britain: Prince Harry Begins New Afghan Deployment
headline.print_headline: Britain: Prince Harry Begins New Afghan Deployment
